nodes.documentation: @notice ensures that only the market owner can do this
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@notice used to prevent integer overflow where users can infput
 @dev notice the number. It's the current exchange rate of 100 dollars an hour
nodes.name: stopIntOverflow

nodes.documentation: @notice ensures that the market for students and teachers can only be created one time
nodes.name: onlyOnce

nodes.documentation: @notice ensures that whatever function is called is called 60 seconds after it is scheduled
nodes.name: allowed

nodes.documentation:
@notice constructor that sets the market information
 @dev assigns a market owner who has the ability to flip the circuit breaker

@notice  flips a state var that pauses all value transfer functions
 @dev used as a defense against malicious users for in the instance that the contract is compromised
nodes.name: circuitPauseAllFundMovement

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You have to deposit at least an hours worth of stake."

nodes.documentation:
@notice allows the tutor to withdraw their funds    
 @dev all amounts are, by defaul, wei
nodes.name: tutorWithdrawFunds

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "It seems that either you don't have an account, you ACTUALLY ARE THE TUTOR - SAVEY?, or your tutor doesn't have the required stake amount."

nodes.documentation:
@notice this function schedules a lesson and then it also trustakes fundstr
 @dev notice the the keccak function to create a unique lesson ID. This can be improved.
nodes.name: scheduleLesson

nodes.documentation: @notice this function takes the students funds out of their account, as well as the tutors, as a promise that it'll happen
nodes.name: stakeFunds

arguments.value: You are not the tutor.

nodes.documentation:
@notice this function allows tutors to confirm the lesson 
 @dev this, and the tutor conifirmation, are the two functions used to enable transferFunds()
nodes.name: tutorConfirmLesson

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are not the student of this lesson."

arguments.value: You are not the student of this lesson.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not the student of this lesson."

nodes.name: getMktOwner
